thread.title: Hear what Nick Saban had to say about Alabama's NFL prospects at the Senior Bowl
thread.title_full: Hear what Nick Saban had to say about Alabama's NFL prospects at the Senior Bowl

author: Matt Scalici | mscalici@al.com
title: Hear what Nick Saban had to say about Alabama's NFL prospects at the Senior Bowl
text: Nick Saban dropped by Senior Bowl practice on Tuesday where four former Alabama stars will be showcasing their talents this week for NFL scouts. Hear what Saban had to say about those players as well as their fellow Crimson Tide stars who...
